data.title: Info Request from Prof. Surjit Singh / Anmol Ghadi
data.text:
Post by Kizzy

Evening,

I have Anmol Ghadi [1946]/Anokhi Ada [1948] CD manufactured by The

Gramaphone Company of India Ltd., Calcutta; sold by www.saragama.com in

the year 2000. This CD has only 12 songs each from each of the movies.

How many original songs does each of these movies have?

Pleasant Times!

Kizzy

Post by m***@yahoo.com

Info Request from Prof. Surjit Singh / Anmol Ghadi - Source

=========================================

I downloaded the 13 songs of Anmol Ghadi from your site.

Can you please let me, if the songs source is LP or Tape / Film

or you had copied them from Video Tape / VCD / DVD

Thanks

Sudhir

Evening,

Here is the song listing of Anmol Ghadi[1946] followed by Anokhi

Ada[1948]:

ANMOL GHADI [1946] - Music: Naushad ::

01. JAWAN HAIN MOHABBAT HASIN HAI ZAMANA - Noor Jehan - Lyrics: Tanvir

Naqvi

02. AWAZ DE KAHAN HAI - Noor Jehan & Surendra - Lyrics: Tanvir Naqvi

03. MERE BACHPAN KE SAATHI - Noor Jehan - Lyrics: Tanvir Naqvi

04. KYUN YAAD AA RAHE HAIN - Surendra - Lyrics: Tanvir Naqvi

05. AAJA MERI BARBAD MOHABBAT KE SAHARE - Noor Jehan - Lyrics: Tanvir

Naqvi

06. SOCHA THA KYA, KYA HO GAYA - Suraiya - Lyrics: Tanvir Naqvi

07. KYA MIL GAYA BHAGWAN - Noor Jehan - Lyrics: Anjum Pilibhiti

08. MAN LETA HAI ANGADAI - Suraiya - Lyrics: Tanvir Naqvi

09. AB KAUN HAI MERA - Surendra - Lyrics: Tanvir Naqvi

10. MAI DIL MEIN DARD BASA LAYI - Suraiya - Lyrics: Tanvir Naqvi

11. UDAN KHATOLE PE UD JAOON - Zohra & Shamshad Begum - Lyrics: Tanvir

Naqvi

12. TERA KHILONA TOOTA - Mohd. Rafi - Lyrics: Tanvir Naqvi

ANOKHI ADA [1948] - Music: Naushad ::

01. BHOOLNE WALE YAAD NA AA - Mukesh - Lyrics: Shakeel Badayuni

02. DIL KO LAGA KE HUM NE - Umadevi - Lyrics: Shakeel Badayuni

03. JALE NA KYUN PARWANA - Surendra - Lyrics: Anjum Pilibhiti

04. NAZAR MIL GAYEE - Shamshad Begum - Lyrics: Shakeel Badayuni

05. BHOOL GAYE KYON - Mukesh & Shamshad Begum - Lyrics: Shakeel

Badayuni

06. KYON UNHE DIL DIYA - Surendra & Shamshad Begum - Lyrics: Shakeel

Badayuni

07. KABHI DIL DIL SE - Mukesh - Lyrics: Shakeel Badayuni

08. KAHE JIYA DOLE - Umadevi - Lyrics: Shakeel Badayuni

09. YE PYAR KI BAATEN - Mukesh - Lyrics: Shakeel Badayuni

10. AAJ KAHAN JA KE - Shamshad Begum - Lyrics: Shakeel Badayuni

11. BADE BHOLE BHALE - Surendra - Lyrics: Anjum Pilibhiti

12. MANZIL KI DHUM MEIN - Mukesh - Lyrics: Shakeel Badayuni

So, which is the 13th song of Anmol Ghadi?

Pleasant Times!

Kizzy

m***@yahoo.com

ANOKHI ADA

===========

The CD is missing two items:, which were released on LP and also

on a 78 rpm record

Title Music

Dance Music

Furthermore on LP the Title Music is only: 1:30 minutes (probably

edited

by HMV), while the 78 rpm version is 2:53 minutes

Also the song: Yeh Pyar Ki Baaten / Mukesh - only 2 paras are there

on the LP, again a cut by HMV). The 78 rpm version has 3 paras.

I am almost certain that the LP (and so also the tape / CD) are from

the 78 rpm records.

Comments from members, who have seen this film in recent past are

welcomed (I saw it about 40 years ago, when only 78 rpm versions

were played on the radio)

ANMOL GHADI

============

The LP has the same 12 songs, as listed for the CD. That is to say

that the Dance Music (available at Prof. Singh's site) is missing.

It seems that the LP source is SoundTrack.

4 ½ songs by Noor Jehan (78 rpm version) were released earlier

on a LP / Noor Jehan - The ½ song is - Aawaz De Kahan Hai, wherein

para rendered by Surendra was chopped off mama.

My analysis is based on:

Aawaz De Kahan Hai 3:09 min / LP,

3:29 min / CD

- Surendra - Vintage

Aaja Meri Barbaad 3:11 / LP

2:43 / 78

rpm - LP / Noor

Mere Bachpan Ke 3:08 / LP

2:55 / 78

rpm - LP / Noor

Again, Like Anokhi Ada, I saw the film about 40 years ago, so

comments from members are welcomed

Sudhir
